description: The main male protagonist. A high schooler who still harbors feelings for a girl he met 10 years ago. His life was turned upside down when he was approached by Kemeko`s pilot who claimed to be his fianc√© and moved to his house. He was then constantly targeted by unknown assailants. His personality is kind but because of a number of misunderstandings that are out of his control, he was constantly physically assaulted by both friends and enemies alike.
name: Kobayashi Sanpeita
